attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all in the UK/ feel that EA Sports are robbing us of some serious gaming action.
We all pay a yearly fee for their servers BUT they seem to let us down, time and time again.

Time to sort this issue out as the XBOX gamers are really sick of the way WE'RE BEING TREATED!

We never recieve any information regarding any possible issues through downtime or server issues which is unacceptable.

We ALL want a refund

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
